alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:57AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sebastian and Le Flore Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 556 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles west of Midland to 6 miles southwest of Heavener to 2 miles southwest of Talimena State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Mansfield... Talihina... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Midland... Cameron... Octavia... Talimena State Park... Big Cedar... Whitesboro... Lake Wister State Park... Muse... Rock Island... Patterson... Arkola... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
